```r
library(rlang)

I = c(1:3, NA)
e = rlang::expr(sum(I))   # defuse
e  #   sum(I) , note:  no eval, no substitute, e is call

# view e as.list, components
as.list(e)
```

Evaluate
```r
rlang::eval_tidy(e)  # NA

# view e as.list
as.list(e)
```


Fix
```r
e$na.rm = TRUE
e   # sum(I, na.rm = T)

# AND, make muliply
e[[1]]  <- rlang::expr(prod)

# view componentns
as.list(e)
e

# evaluate
rlang::eval_tidy(e)  # 6
```
